summary: LEFT TAIL LIGHT OUT. FOUND MELTED NEGATIVE CONNECTOR ON PLUG TO LEFT TAIL LIGHT. I REPAIRED THIS BY CONNECTING TO A DIFFERENT POINT ON THE TAIL LIGHT ASSEMBLY. FOUND TODAY, 14.AUG 2013 THAT REVERSE LIGHT WILL NOT WORK. INVESTIGATED AND FOUND NO POWER TO THE PLUG FOR THE REVERSE LIGHT BULB,WHICH HAS BEEN CHECKED BY VOLTMETER.  *TR
